entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Nipawin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:30 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -9.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nipawin Airport 06:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -9.1°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -9.8°C
Wind: S 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Freezing rain or snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain beginning this morning then changing to snow this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
